unnormalised: Hey guys, so I was at the doc’s yesterday, right? Dr. Sharma, real nice lady, but her handwriting… forget about it! She scribbled something down and said, "Take 5 ml twice a day after food." 5 ml! What even IS that? I mean, is that like, a shot glass full? A teaspoon? A capful from the bottle? Should I ask my naniji? Her measurements are "a pinch" and "until your ancestors tell you to stop adding haldi."
